definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Foci of bizarre nuclei were, however, present in 10 cases.
sentences.chinese: 但是，灶性奇异细胞核出现在10例肿瘤中。

sentences.english: The characteristics of tetrad was that the nucleus and Golgi bodies being in the active state.
sentences.chinese: 四分孢子的显著特征是细胞核和高尔基体呈活跃状态。

sentences.english: Rats of the traits that depend on the source of the nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 说明仔鼠的性状取决于细胞核的来源。

sentences.english: The nucleolus is the most obvious structure seen in the nucleus of a eucaryotic cell when viewed in the light microscope.
sentences.chinese: 核仁是在光学显微镜下看到细胞核中最明显结构。

sentences.english: Both microtubule and actin cytoskeleton have been shown to be involved in proper nuclear positioning.
sentences.chinese: 细胞骨架微管和肌动蛋白都参与了细胞核定位的过程。

sentences.english: The cell nucleus and cytoplasm become fragmented as enzymes such as caspases destroy cellular components.
sentences.chinese: 细胞核和细胞质由于酶的作用变成了碎片。

sentences.english: The nuclear chromatin in the outer nuclear layer gathered toward the center with the uneven distribution.
sentences.chinese: 外核层细胞核染色质固缩，分布不均匀，向中央聚集。

sentences.english: The article studies the inductive effect of erythrocytes nucleus of the toad, Bufo gargarizans by herbicide butachlor.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究除草剂丁草胺对蟾蜍红细胞核的诱变效应。

sentences.english: Subsequently, chromatin is isolated from nuclei and subjected to sonication.
sentences.chinese: 随后，染色质从细胞核中分离并进行超声打断。

sentences.english: This was the first successful nuclear transplant involving cells of a warm-blooded animal.
sentences.chinese: 这是温血动物细胞核移植试验的首次成功。

sentences.english: Zones of loosely arranged euchromatin are located mainly in the center of the nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 疏松的染色质区带主要位于细胞核的中心部。

sentences.english: This was the first successful nuclear transplant involving cells of a warm-blooded animal .
sentences.chinese: 这是温血动物细胞核移植试验的首次成功。

sentences.english: However, the neoplastic cells show pleomorphism, with hyperchromatic nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤细胞的多形性明显，细胞核深染。

sentences.english: Crevices also existed in the nucleus. The nuclear membrane fractured and even disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 细胞核变形，核内出现裂隙，核膜受损，甚至消失。

sentences.english: The inheritance of scab resistance in wheat is controlled by nuclear genes.
sentences.chinese: 小麦赤霉病抗性遗传是由细胞核基因控制的。

sentences.english: Prominent nucleoli are seen in the nuclei of this prostatic adenocarcinoma, which is a characteristic feature.
sentences.chinese: 细胞核中可见明显核仁是前列腺癌典型的特征。
